_description: Configuration for cyclic peptide multimer prediction

model.name: boltz1
model._comment: boltz1 or boltz2. Multimers may benefit from boltz2's enhanced interface prediction

processing._accelerator_comment: cpu or gpu. GPU recommended for large multimers
processing._diffusion_comment: More samples for multimers to capture diverse binding modes
processing._recycling_comment: More recycling steps for complex interactions
processing._msa_comment: Use ColabFold MSA server for sequence alignment

multimer._auto_chain_comment: Generate chain IDs automatically (A, B, C, etc.)
multimer._min_comment: Minimum number of chains required for multimer prediction
multimer._max_comment: Recommended maximum chains for reasonable processing time

validation._unique_comment: Ensure chain IDs are unique across the multimer

output._auto_comment: Generate output directory name based on chain count and total length

homodimer.description: Two identical cyclic peptides forming a dimer

heterotrimer.description: Three different cyclic peptides forming a complex
